channel.title: C%2B%2B on sloppy quorum

item.title: Convert hasNext style iterator to C++ Range
item.author: rahul.kushwaha@gmail.com (Rahul Kushwaha)
item.description: Key-value stores provide a generic API to store and retrieve values using the key. In this post, we will see how relational tables can be mapped to key-value stores.
